item.title: Instructions: May 19
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: The 18th is the Long Weekend. Take a break from your school work, if you can. Goals for this week Listen Read Do With tech work, if it doesn’t come together in about 30 minutes, it won’t come in an hour. So take a break. Close the laptop. Call somebody up for help. Find another pair of eyes to look at the problem. I don’t want to hear that you labored heroically for 2 hours to do something.
